import { useState } from "react" export default function Topbar() { const [showLogin, setShowLogin] = useState(false); const [userName, setUserName] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const handleLogin = async () => { console.log("Username: " + userName); console.log("Password: " + password); } return ( <>
Database app
{showLogin && (
Log In
setUserName(e.target.value)} />
setPassword(e.target.value)} />
)} ) }
